00003 #include "HistogramFitFCN.h"

00005 TemplateFitter::TemplateFitter() {
00006 
00007   HistogramFitFCN* fcn = new HistogramFitFCN();
00008   fMinuitFitter = new TFitterMinuit(3); //  Three (3) parameters to modify (amplitude, time, pedestal)
00009   fMinuitFitter->SetMinuitFCN(fcn);
00010   fMinuitFitter->SetPrintLevel(-1); // set the debug level to quiet (-1=quiet, 0=normal, 1=verbose)
00011 }

00013 TemplateFitter::~TemplateFitter() {
00014 }

00016 void TemplateFitter::FitPulseToTemplate(TH1D* hTemplate, const TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00017   // First make a histogram out of the pulse with the same bin width as the template,
00018   // Then pass to fitter.
00019   // Returns ped in units of ADC counts, amp in... scale units(?), and time in units
00020   // of bins since the beginning of pulse
00021   std::vector<int> samples = pulse->GetSamples();
00022   int n_samples = samples.size();
00023 
00024   TH1D* hPulse = new TH1D("hPulseToFit", "hPulseToFit", n_samples, -0.5, n_samples - 0.5);
00025   for (int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00026     hPulse->SetBinContent(i+1, samples.at(i));
00027   }
00028 
00029   // Prepare for minimizations
00030   fMinuitFitter->Clear();
00031   HistogramFitFCN* fcn = (HistogramFitFCN*)fMinuitFitter->GetMinuitFCN();
00032   fcn->SetH1(hTemplate);
00033   fcn->SetH2(hPulse);
00034   fMinuitFitter->SetParameter(0, "Pedestal", fPedestal, 0.1, 0, 0);
00035   fMinuitFitter->SetParameter(1, "Amplitude", fAmplitude, 0.1, 0, 0);
00036   fMinuitFitter->SetParameter(2, "Time", fTime, 1., 0, 0); // Timing should have step size no smaller than binning,
00037                                                     // *IF* the fourth argument is step size this is okay,
00038                                                     // or later implement some interpolation method, note
00039                                                     // *DERIVATIVES* at bounderies of interpolation may cause
00040                                                     // problems since MIGRAD (the default method) relies on
00041                                                     // these heavily.
00042   fMinuitFitter->CreateMinimizer();
00043 
00044   // Minimize and notify if there was a problem
00045   int status = fMinuitFitter->Minimize();
00046   if (status != 0)
00047     std::cout << "ERROR: Problem with fit (" << status << ")!" << std::endl;
00048 
00049   // Store the Chi2, and then we can delete the pulse
00050   std::vector<double> params; 
00051   params.push_back(fPedestal); 
00052   params.push_back(fAmplitude); 
00053   params.push_back(fTime); 
00054   fChi2 = (*fcn)(params);
00055 
00056   delete hPulse;
00057 }
